_sText:
I continue in Uvalno village reconstruction. So here is 1st playable version of map uvalno_ulicni (real reconstruction map named after my friend's surname).

I rebuilt it to hostage rescue version, where hostages are teleported on random locations in house. Iit may increase fun (different strategy cases due to hostages locations)

Technical note: Please don't be confused... Max/Min Fade distance causing disappearing some far-away props. IT IS NOT BUG, it is optimization method.

Try updated version cs_ uvalno _villa _pro 

If you like this one, check all of my maps here
This map or its parts is also used in my singleplayer mod

Have a fun
Dinus Saurus
